content.rendered:
Directed by Tushar Hiranandani

Written by Balwinder Singh Janjua. Balwinder Singh Janjua. Vishavjot Mann. Jagdeep Sidhu

Cast Taapsee Pannu (Prakashi Tomar). Bhumi Pednekar (Chandro Tomar). Prakash Jha (Sarpanch Ratan Singh Tomar). Vineet Kumar Singh (Dr. Yashpal). Pawan Chopra (Jai Singh). Pritha Bakshi (Seema Tomar). Sara Arjun (Shefali Tomar). Himanshu Sharma (Sachin Tomar). Shaad Randhawa (Rambir Tomar). Navneet Srivastava (Farooq). Dinesh Mohan (Maharaja of Alwar). Nikhat Khan (Mehendra Kumari- Maharani Of Alwar). Raunak Bhinder (Young Bhanwar Singh (as Raunakk Bhnder)). Kavita Vaid (Bimla Tomar) . Yudhvir Ahlawat (Young Rambir Tomar). Vicky Kadian (Rakesh Sharma). Trupti Khamkar (Young Bimla). Amol Nikhare (Young jai Singh). Sumit S. Rajput (Groom in TV in codom add). Bushra Khan Bullet Rani ((as Bushra Khan)). Kuldeep Sareen (Bhnwar Singh Tomar). Yogendra Singh (Young Ratan Singh)

Languages Hindi

Producers Ghanteshwar T. Guru. Anurag Kashyap. Nidhi Parmar. Ajay Rai. Vinay G. Rai. Rahul Rawat. Ankur B. Saraiya. Navmeet Singh. Sahil Singh

Production Reliance Entertainment
